com.bumptech.glide.load.model.stream
Interface StreamModelLoader<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The type of the model that will be translated into an InputStream.
All Superinterfaces:
ModelLoader<T,InputStream>
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseGlideUrlLoader, StreamByteArrayLoader, StreamFileLoader, StreamResourceLoader, StreamStringLoader, StreamUriLoader
public interface StreamModelLoader<T>
extends ModelLoader<T,InputStream>

A base class for ModelLoaders that translate models into InputStreams.
